law.catch_line: Business transactions of partners with partnership.
law.text: Except as provided in the partnership agreement, a partner may lend money to, and transact other business with, the limited partnership and, subject to other applicable law, shall have the same rights and obligations with respect thereto as a person who is not a partner.
law.history: Repeal the prior repeal contained in 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, which was to have been effective January 1, 2008, 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 180, effective June 26, 2007. -- Repealed 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, effective January 1, 2008. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 284, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1988.
